src:
'Ngocok Yuk' Dihadang Satpol PP Padang
02 Nov 2019, 06:26 by Tim detikcom
Padang - Mobil penjual minuman 'Ngocok Yuk' dihadang Satuan Polisi Pamong Praja (Satpol PP) Kota Padang, Sumatera Barat. Merek minuman 'Ngocok Yuk' dianggap meresahkan dan berasosiasi negatif.
Mobil penjual minuman ini diamankan di kawasan Stadion Agus Salim, Padang. Mobil bersama pemiliknya dibawa ke markas Satpol PP.
Menurut Kepala Satpol PP Kota Padang Al Amin, penggunaan nama dan brand 'Ngocok Yuk' sangat mengganggu dan melanggar norma. 'Ngocok Yuk' merupakan kepanjangan dari 'ngopi cokelat' dan memiliki tagline 'makin dikocok, makin nikmat'.
"Kita menerima laporan adanya brand usaha kopi coklat 'Ngocok Yuk, Makin Dikocok Makin Nikmat' itu. Setelah kita datangi, ternyata memang benar, dan selanjutnya kita bawa ke kantor," kata Al Amin, Kamis (31/10).
text:
'Beat It' Blocked by Satpol PP Padang
02 Nov 2019, 06:26 by Tim detikcom
Padang - The car seller of the 'Ngukul Yuk' beverage is blocked by the Padang Civil Service Police Unit (Satpol PP), West Sumatra. The drink brand 'Ngukul Yuk' is considered disturbing and negative association.
This drink seller car is secured in the Agus Salim Stadium area, Padang. The car and its owner were taken to the Satpol PP headquarters.
According to the Head of the Padang City Satpol PP Al Amin, the use of the name and brand 'Ngukul Yuk' is very disturbing and violates the norm. 'Yuk yuk' is an extension of 'chocolate coffee' and has the tagline 'the more it is shaken, the more delicious'.
"We received a report on the existence of the chocolate coffee business brand 'Ngukul Yuk, More Shaken and More Delicious'. After we went, it turned out to be true, and then we took it to the office," Al Amin said, Thursday (10/31).
